import React, { useState } from 'react' function Read({datas, titleClickId, onHandleDeleteBtn, onHandleUpdateTitle, onHandleUpdateContent, onHandleChange}) { // console.log(titleClickId); const titleClickContent = datas.filter((el)=>el.id === titleClickId); const [modifyClick, setModifyClick] = useState(false); const modify = (() => { modifyClick ? setModifyClick(false) : setModifyClick(true); console.log(modifyClick); }) return (
{titleClickContent.length !== 0 ? modifyClick === false ?
{titleClickContent[0].title}
{titleClickContent[0].username} {titleClickContent[0].createdAt}
{titleClickContent[0].content}
:
{titleClickContent[0].username} {titleClickContent[0].createdAt}
:
삭제된 게시물 입니다.
}
) } export default Read
